1.content:
Eclipse sighed as he sat in the remnants of the escape shuttle that he used against his will to avoid the destruction of the Black Aliens at the hands of Team Dark and GUN, after he originally crashed he made it his goal to destroy Shadow and everything he stood for as revenge but his first attempt ended in failure as he was beaten by him once again alongside an Echidna who guarded a magical emerald that contained an immense power. The only thing that was keeping him going at this point were the Black Wisps he was taking care of on his own when that made an idea suddenly pop up into his head: how he converted these former wisps into what they were now in the first place. Eclipse scavenged around for a container of what he referred to as ‘Black Alien Goo’ a liquid female members of the species released from their breasts and occasionally even their mouths that was used on the wisps as well as plant life in order to convert them. Looking inside of his container he knew there wasn’t nearly enough of it to convert anything bigger than a wisp but if he were to make more he would need a female member of the species...”Wait maybe it could work!”
Eclipse recalled the training he went through in particular learning to take on his large muscular form that was unrivaled in strength but could only be managed for a short time, in order to take on the form he needed to imagine being as strong as Black Arm giants but what if he instead of being as well endowed as a female member of his species? The darkling stood up and closed his eyes as he made his first attempt recalling how they looked like as his chest quickly had two orbs shoot out until they were quite prominent, his Adam’s shrank into nothingness, and his penis also shrank into his body and reformed into a vagina making Eclipse now a her. “Excellent...” Eclipse opened her eyes as she looked down at her body and began to examine it with her hands. “Oh this feels so great!” Wasting little time the alien ran around the ship collecting all sorts of different containers and filling them with her goo until after several minutes later she grew exhausted. “I think that is enough...” Eclipse closed her eyes again as she focused on her old form however it took her a bit to remember it and for a second she forgot she was ever even a male. The transformation was as quick as it was into a woman as Eclipse smiled looking at his work, “I did good but that could’ve easily gone wrong...” The Black Aliens now started gathering all of his work and put the containers in different bags not noticing the sway of his hips as he moved, an effect from staying too long in the female form that he didn’t realize wasn’t natural for him to do. With all of this goo he could target all sorts of things like an Eggman base headed by the Eggboss obsessed with Eggman Thunderbolt or he could start his revenge on Knuckles by attacking Angel Island.

info.brief_description: Eclipse makes a last ditch effort to revitalize the Black Alien race on Mobius
info.description:
This story follows Eclipse as he uses abilities he previously was unaware of to transform targets into Black Aliens with the intention of changing as many as possibly can. This doesn’t come without risks however as he can only convert people while taking on a female form in which he will feel a growing urge to breed the longer he stays in it and if he does give in to the urge he’ll lose his mind and since he is the leader of the Black Arms hive mind so will all of his followers.
Rules:
No OC/FCs

This story has Eclipse as the main character so try to keep it following him, you can show the viewpoint of others occasionally

No inflation

No vore

No changing people into body parts, clothes, inorganic objects, etc Eclipse is intent on only changing people into fellow Black Aliens bare in mind he can change their gender during the conversion process only but he will in most cases keep the individuals the same gender as they were pre-transformation

This is a Sonic story so no characters from other franchises

Eclipse is an Archie Sonic only character so to use characters from outside that canon you will need an explanation for why they are there and what they are doing, they can’t just suddenly appear and expect every character to know them.

No diaper, scat, or water sports

All characters are of age so this won’t have to be asked later on.

No feet stuff

If Eclipse loses “herself” she will try to breed with any and every male she runs into in an attempt to have as much children as possible which will also mean any more converted into Black Aliens at that point would be changed into male if they weren’t already.

Eclipse’s transformation abilities do not work on robots

If you write a sex scene be sure to add a warning at the start of the chapter
